game.name: DCS: Mi-8MTV2 Crew Part 1 Campaign
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 캡션 이용 가능, VR 지원, 컨트롤러 일부 지원
game.shortDescription: And again, you take over the seat of the commander of a Mi-8MTV2. You are Dmitry Tarasov - a young pilot, who climbs the career ladder and is faced with professional difficulties that your crew helps to overcome. The adventure story of the Crew campaign consists of two parts.
